text: Gréta Kácsor (born 24 April 2000) is a Hungarian handballer for Váci NKSE. ==Achievements== ;National team *IHF Women's Junior World Championship: **: 2018 *Junior European Championship: **: 2019 *European Youth Olympic Festival: **: 2017 *IHF Youth World Championship: **: 2018 *Youth European Championship: **: 2017 ==Awards and recognition== * Hungarian Youth Handballer of the Year: 2017, 2018 * All-Star Team Best Left Back of the Junior European Championship: 2019 ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Handball players from Budapest Category:Hungarian female handball players
title: Gréta Kácsor
